author: Juggerbyte

text: Almost every version includes both games. This version is "Ys I & II Chronicles" which includes Ys I Chronicles and Ys II Chronicles. The song is from Ys II Chronicles but the image is from Ys I Chronicles. But even so, it's kind of splitting hairs since Ys I & II are really two parts of the same game and always have been. It's more like Ys 1: Part 1 and Ys 1: Part 2, but that's not how the numbering works.

author: kionashi

text: I finished the first Ys Chronicles a couple weeks ago and found it alright, but this game is superior in every way. A great arranged soundtrack, pleasant graphics and generally more fleshed out, which is expected. The fact that you can attack diagonally is a big plus compared to the first game. I immediately loved this chill town theme, great guitar. The basic battle system and shoot 'em up style bosses make me prefer Oath in Felghana, but it's still a very fun game.
author: SupraDarky
